_note: Mahadasha/Antardasha lord activates the significations of houses they own

description: Lagna lord dasha: Self-development, health, personality enhancement
2nd lord dasha: Wealth accumulation, family matters, speech
3rd lord dasha: Courage, efforts, siblings, communication, short travels
4th lord dasha: Home, mother, vehicles, inner peace, education
5th lord dasha: Children, romance, creativity, intelligence, past merit
6th lord dasha (dusthana): Disease, enemies, debts, service - challenges and conflicts
7th lord dasha: Marriage, partnerships, business, spouse, public dealings
8th lord dasha (dusthana): Transformation, longevity, obstacles, occult, sudden events
9th lord dasha: Fortune, dharma, higher learning, father, long travels, spirituality
10th lord dasha: Career, status, authority, public image, achievements
11th lord dasha: Gains, income, friends, aspirations, elder siblings
12th lord dasha (dusthana): Expenses, losses, foreign lands, isolation, moksha, enlightenment
Dasha lord exalted: Amplifies positive results by 30%
Dasha lord in own sign: Strong, stable results
Dasha lord debilitated: Weakens results by 40%
Dasha lord retrograde: Delays, introspection, revisiting past matters
Dasha lord combust: Reduced strength, ego conflicts
Yogakaraka planet dasha: Excellent for material and spiritual progress

_note: Transiting planets activate houses they pass through

Moon transit 2nd: Focus on wealth, family, speech
Moon transit 3rd: Communication, short travels, courage
Moon transit 4th: Home comfort, emotional security, peace

Moon transit 10th: Career focus, public recognition, ambition
Moon transit 11th: Gains, fulfillment, social connections
Moon transit 12th: Isolation, expenses, spiritual retreat
Saturn transit 1st (Sade Sati phase 1): Health issues, delays, introspection
Saturn transit 3rd: Hard work pays off, courage through discipline
Saturn transit 6th: Victory over enemies, disease, and debts through persistence
Saturn transit 7th: Relationship strain, partnership delays, testing
Saturn transit 8th: Major obstacles, transformation through hardship, longevity tests
Saturn transit 10th: Career discipline, authority through hard work, recognition
Saturn transit 11th: Gains through sustained effort, elder support
Saturn transit 12th (Sade Sati phase 3): Expenses, isolation, spiritual growth, liberation
Jupiter transit 1st: Wisdom, health improvement, optimism, personal growth

Jupiter transit 9th: Fortune, dharma, father's blessings, pilgrimage, higher learning
Jupiter transit 10th: Career advancement, authority, professional success
Jupiter transit 11th: Maximum gains, income increase, fulfillment of desires
Mars transit 1st: Energy boost, aggression, accidents, impulsive actions
Mars transit 2nd: Speech conflicts, financial stress, family disputes
Mars transit 3rd: Courage, initiative, sibling conflicts, vigorous efforts
Mars transit 6th: Victory over enemies, disease, competition
Mars transit 7th: Relationship conflicts, partnership disputes
Mars transit 8th: Accidents, surgery, sudden events, danger caution
Mars transit 10th: Career drive, leadership, aggressive pursuit of goals
Mars transit 11th: Gains through effort, elder brother support, achievement
Venus transit 1st: Charm, beauty, attraction, comfort, self-love
Venus transit 2nd: Wealth from arts, family harmony, sweet speech

Venus transit 5th: Romance peak, creativity, artistic expression, joy
Venus transit 7th: Partnership harmony, marriage prospects, diplomatic success
Venus transit 10th: Career in arts/luxury, public image enhancement
Venus transit 11th: Income from luxury, social success, friendships
Mercury transit 1st: Communication skills, intellectual clarity, wit
Mercury transit 2nd: Business acumen, financial planning, articulation
Mercury transit 3rd: Writing, media, communication, short travels, networking
Mercury transit 5th: Intellectual pursuits, education, speculation, teaching
Mercury transit 9th: Higher learning, philosophy, long distance communication
Mercury transit 10th: Career in communication, business deals, professional networking
Sun transit 1st: Vitality, confidence, self-focus, birthday period
Sun transit 5th: Creative expression, authority over children, romance, speculation
Sun transit 9th: Father's support, dharma, fortune, spiritual authority
Sun transit 10th: Peak career visibility, authority, government favor, recognition
Sun transit 11th: Gains from authority figures, income, influential friends
Dharma-Karma Raja Yoga: 9th and 10th lords in conjunction/mutual aspect - high status, power
Dhana Yoga: 2nd and 11th lords together - wealth accumulation
Gaja Kesari Yoga: Jupiter in kendra from Moon - wisdom, prosperity, respect
Budha-Aditya Yoga: Sun-Mercury conjunction - intelligence, communication skills
Hamsa Mahapurusha Yoga: Jupiter in kendra in own/exaltation - righteous, learned, prosperous
Malavya Mahapurusha Yoga: Venus in kendra in own/exaltation - luxury, beauty, arts
Ruchaka Mahapurusha Yoga: Mars in kendra in own/exaltation - warrior, commander, courage
Bhadra Mahapurusha Yoga: Mercury in kendra in own/exaltation - scholar, businessman, eloquent
Shasha Mahapurusha Yoga: Saturn in kendra in own/exaltation - longevity, discipline, authority
Viparita Raja Yoga: Dusthana lords in dusthana - success from adversity
Strong 1st lord: Resilience, self-confidence, vitality baseline boost
Strong 2nd lord: Wealth foundation, family support, financial stability
Strong 5th lord: Romance favored, creativity, intelligence, children blessings
Strong 9th lord: Fortune baseline, dharmic path, higher wisdom accessible
Strong 10th lord: Career foundation solid, professional success likely
Weak 10th lord: Career struggles baseline, need extra effort for recognition
Afflicted Moon: Emotional volatility baseline, anxiety tendency
Strong Moon: Emotional stability, mental clarity, intuition baseline
Strong 8th lord: Occult ability, transformation capacity, sudden gains possible
Strong 11th lord: Income opportunities abundant, gains amplified
SPIKE: 10th dasha + Jupiter transit 10th - Career breakthrough period
SPIKE: 7th dasha + Venus transit 5th - Romance/marriage peak period
SPIKE: 2nd dasha + Jupiter transit 11th - Maximum wealth accumulation
CAUTION: 6th dasha + Saturn transit 6th - Health challenges intensify
DANGER: 8th dasha + Mars transit 8th - Accident/surgery caution, transformation crisis
BLESSING: 9th dasha + Jupiter transit 9th - Divine grace, dharma peak, fortune
FERTILE: 5th dasha + Jupiter transit 5th - Childbirth, creative peak, romance
CONFLICT: 2nd dasha + Mars transit 2nd - Financial stress, family disputes
ISOLATION: 12th dasha + Saturn transit 12th - Expenses, solitude, moksha opportunity
PROSPERITY: 11th dasha + Jupiter transit 2nd - Wealth flow from multiple sources
Moon in 8th aspected by Saturn: Deep anxiety, depression tendency
Moon in 4th aspected by Jupiter: Peace, optimism, emotional nourishment
Moon-Rahu conjunction (Grahan Yoga): Confusion, obsessive thoughts, mental fog
Moon-Ketu conjunction: Detachment, spiritual crisis, emotional isolation
Moon in 1st aspected by Mars: Impulsiveness, anger, restlessness
Mercury retrograde: Communication mishaps, decision delays, mental confusion
Moon in 6th aspected by Mars: Conflicts, aggression, health anxiety
Venus in 12th aspected by Saturn: Loneliness, relationship isolation, expenditure on pleasure
Sun-Saturn conjunction: Father issues, authority conflicts, depression, delays
Moon in 9th aspected by Jupiter: Divine blessings, optimism, wisdom, faith

_note: Shadow planets moving through houses - 1.5 years per sign

description: Rahu transit 1st: Identity crisis, unconventional behavior, health issues, confusion
Rahu transit 3rd (Upachaya): Courage boost, unconventional success, media gains
Rahu transit 6th (Upachaya): Victory over enemies through cunning, disease conquered
Rahu transit 7th: Unconventional partnerships, foreign spouse, relationship instability
Rahu transit 10th (Upachaya): Sudden career rise, unconventional profession, technology/foreign
Rahu transit 11th (Upachaya): Unexpected gains, foreign income, networking success
Ketu transit 1st: Detachment from self, spiritual awakening, health issues, identity loss
Ketu transit 4th: Detachment from home/mother, inner spiritual search, property loss
Ketu transit 7th: Detachment from relationships, separation tendency, spiritual partnership
Ketu transit 9th: Deep spirituality, moksha pursuit, detachment from dharma, mysticism
Ketu transit 10th: Career instability, detachment from ambition, spiritual work
Ketu transit 12th: Liberation, moksha, foreign lands, enlightenment opportunity
Neecha Bhanga Raja Yoga: Debilitation cancelled - fall leads to rise, rags to riches
Parivartana Yoga: Mutual house exchange - strengthens both houses significantly
Adhi Yoga: Benefics in 6/7/8 from Moon - prosperity, power, longevity
Chandra Mangala Yoga: Moon-Mars conjunction/aspect - wealth, property, assertive emotions
Lakshmi Yoga: 9th lord in kendra with Venus - wealth, beauty, fortune of goddess
Guru Chandal Dosha: Jupiter-Rahu conjunction - wisdom corrupted, religious hypocrisy
Kala Sarpa Yoga: All planets between Rahu-Ketu - obstacles, delays, spiritual intensity
Amala Yoga: Natural benefic in 10th from Moon/Lagna - spotless reputation, prosperity
Sunapha Yoga: Planet (not Sun) in 2nd from Moon - self-made wealth, intelligence
Anapha Yoga: Planet (not Sun) in 12th from Moon - good character, eloquence, wealth
10th lord in 1st: Self-made career, personal effort leads to success, strong karma
10th lord in 7th: Career through partnerships, public dealings, business success
10th lord in 10th: Very strong career, high status, professional excellence
9th lord in 1st: Lucky personality, dharmic life, father's blessings embodied
9th lord in 9th: Maximum fortune, dharma, spirituality, father support strong
5th lord in 9th: Purva punya (past merit) strong, dharmic children, good fortune
2nd lord in 11th: Wealth from gains, financial prosperity, income multiplies savings
11th lord in 2nd: Gains convert to wealth, financial security through income
7th lord in 1st: Spouse influences personality, early marriage, partnership focus
8th lord in 8th: Longevity, occult power, transformation mastery, sudden events
Mars 4th aspect: Aggression towards 4th house matters - home conflicts, property disputes
Mars 8th aspect: Energy to 8th house - accidents, surgery, transformation through force
Jupiter 5th aspect: Wisdom to 5th house - blessed children, creativity, intelligence
Jupiter 9th aspect: Grace to 9th house - fortune amplified, dharma supported, guru blessings
Saturn 3rd aspect: Discipline to 3rd house - persistent efforts, delayed results, hard work
Saturn 10th aspect: Structure to 10th house - career discipline, authority through hard work
Mercury combust: Communication issues, nervous system affected, intellect clouded
Venus combust: Relationship issues, artistic abilities diminished, pleasure reduced
Jupiter combust: Wisdom diminished, fortune reduced, spiritual guidance weakened
Mars combust: Courage affected, aggression misdirected, energy scattered
Saturn combust: Career delays intensified, discipline weakened, authority conflicts
Venus-Saturn period: Relationship delays, karmic love lessons, wealth through discipline

Mars-Mars period: Maximum courage and aggression, property gains, accident caution

Jupiter-Saturn both on 7th: Marriage materialization, partnership formalization, commitment
Jupiter-Saturn both on 10th: Career peak manifestation, lasting professional success, authority
